lines.text: The Sonora Kid is a gentle lamb / His fleece is black as snow...
[Ted shoots the whiskey bottle out of Dobie's hand]
I don't like your brand of humor. Next time, I'll aim at your funny bone.
Pinky Snyder - M.D., D.V.M. and D.V.G., P.D.Q. and C.O.D., and T.N.T.
Why, whittled down to size, that sounds like a pill peddler.
Dobie and Shad should be waitin' for us at the top of the grade.
You know, kid, I've just been thinkin'. What's the use of us playing Santa Claus?
Why split the gold four ways when you don't have to?
